definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: the under part (Ar. tah.tun id.), hence as

definitions.title: adv. accus.
definitions.body: and

definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: underneath, below, instead of (so Ar. tah.ta, Sab. [[תחת]], Eth. t4h.t: Ph. [[תחת]] (Lzb:385); BAram. Targum, [[תְּחוֹת]], Palm. in [[מן לתחת]] Tariff 1:4 (Cooke:320), Syr. th.uwt );—
as

definitions.title: adv. accus.
definitions.body: † Ge 49:25 (= De 33:13) the deep [[רׂבֶחֶת תָָּחַת]] that coucheth beneath; more usu. with [[מִן]], [[מִתָּחַת]] lit. off ([[מִן]]

definitions.title: 1 c
definitions.body: ) the under part = beneath, † Ex 20:4 (= De 5:8) [[בָּאָרֶץ מִתָָּחַת]] (so De 4:39, Jos 2:11, 1Ki 8:23 [both D:2], Is 51:6), De 33:27, Ju Jdg 7:8, Am 2:9, Is 14:9, Job 18:16, Ez Eze 47:1 b

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: as

under, beneath, Ge 7:19 [[הַשָּׁמַיִם תַּחַת כָּל־]] under the whole heaven (so † De 2:25, De 4:19, Job 28:24, Job 37:3, Job 41:3, Da 9:12), Ge 18:4 [[הָעֵץ]] ´[[ת]]:, Ge 21:15, Ge 24:2 + oft.; Job 30:14 [[שׁוֹאָה]] ´[[תּ]]: under the crash they roll themselves against me; [[הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ]] ´[[ת]]: Ec 1:3, Ec 1:9, Ec 1:13 + oft. Ec. (so in Ph., Cooke:4:7, 5:12). With [[לְ]] † 2Ch 4:3 [[תַּחַת לוֹ]], Ct So 2:6 = So 8:3 [[לְראׁשִׁי]] ´[[ת]]:. Idiom.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[תַּחַת הָהָר]] at the foot of the mt., Ex 24:4, De 4:11, so De 3:17 ´[[אַשְׁדּׂת הַפִּסְגָּה ת]]: Jos 11:3, Jos 11:17 + ; fig. Ps 18:37 [[תַּחְתָָּי תַּרְחִיד אְעָדַי]] thou broadenest mysteps under me, Job 36:15 [[רַחַב לאׂ מוּחָק תַּחְתֶּיךָ]] (so read for [[תחתיה]], Di Bu) breadth unstraitened is beneath thee.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ´[[הַלָּשׁוֹן ת]]:, of something held there as a dainty morsel, and ready, when needed, to be brought out, fig. of sweetness Ct So 4:11, of evil Ps 10:7 ´[[לְשׁׂנוֹ עָמָל וָאָוֶן ת]]:, Job 20:12 (so [[שְׁפָתֵימוֹ]] ´[[ת]]: Ps 140:4), of praise Ps 66:17 [[לְשׁׂנוֹ]] ´[[וְרוֹמַם ת]]: (syn, [[בִּגְרוֹנָם]]Ps 149:6).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: ´[[תַּחַת פ]]:: (a) of subjection, Ps 18:40 [[תַּחְתָָּי תַּכְּ רִיעַ קָמַי]], v:Ps 18:48 (cf. Ps 47:4, Ps 144:2), Ps 45:6, Job 9:13. (b) of a woman, [[אִישָׁתּ]] ´[[ת]]:, i.e. under his authority, Nu 5:19, Nu 5:20, Nu 5:29, so Ez Eze 23:5 [[תַּחְתַּי]] being under me = being mine (fig. of Israel as ´[[י]]:’s spouse), cf. u(/pandrov Ro 7:2, and tah.ta Kor 66:10. (c) of being burdened or oppressed under, Is 24:5 the earth [[יֽשְׁבֶיהָ]] ´[[הָֽנְפָה ת]]:, Pr 30:21 [[שָׁלוֹשׁ רָגְזָה אֶרֶץ]] ´[[ת]]:, v:Pr 30:22, v:Pr 30:23; Hb Hab 3:7 [[אָיֶן]] ´[[ת]]: i.e. (si vera 1.) suffering under calamity.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: ´[[רַגְלֵי פ]] :´[[ת]]:, of subjection or conquest, Ps 8:7 [[רַגְלָיו כּׂל]] ´[[שַׁתָּה ת]]:, Ps 18:39, Ps 47:4, La 3:34, cf. Mal 3:31.
what is under one, the place in which one stands: hence as accus.,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: with reflex. pron., idiom., in one’s place, where one stands, Ex 16:29 [[תַּחְתָּיו שְׁבוּ אִישׁ]] abide every one in his place, Le 13:23, Le 13:28, Jos 5:8, Jos 6:5, Jos 6:20, Ju Jdg 7:21, 1Sa 14:9 [[וְעָמַדְנוּ תַחְתֵּינוּ]] we will remain where we are, 2Sa 2:23 [[וַיָּמָת תַּחְתָּו]] he died where he was (cf. Je 38:9 [read [[וּמֵת]]]), Je 7:10, Is 25:10, Is 46:7, Am 2:13, Hb Hab 3:16 [[וְתַחְתַּי אֶרְגָּ֑ז]] I tremble where I stand, Zec 12:6, Zec 14:10, Job 36:20, Job 40:12 [[תַּחְתָּם]]

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in transferred sense, in place of, instead of: (a) Ge 2:18, Ge 4:25 [[הֶבֶל]] ´[[ת]]: instead of Abel, Ge 22:13 [[בְּנוֹ]] ´[[ת]]:, Ge 30:2 [[אלהיס אנכי]] ´[[הֲת]]: (cf. Ge 50:19), Ge 44:33, 2Sa 19:1 + oft.; Job 16:4, Is 3:24, Is 55:13, Is 61:3, Is 61:7; of one succeeding to the place of another, [[תַּחְתָּיו וַיִּמְחֽ]] Ge 36:33-49, 1Ki 8:20, 1Ki 11:43, 1Ki 14:20 + oft., De 2:12, De 2:21 [[וַיֵּֽשְׁבוּ תַחְתָּם]], Le 16:32, 1Ki 2:35 +; Ps 45:17 in place of thy fathers (whom thou mayest therefore forget) will be thy children. Cf. in Ph CIS:i.3.9 (Cooke:30). Sq. inf. Is 60:15 [[הֱיוֹתֵח]] ´[[ת]]: instead of thy being . . . Peculiarly Job 34:26 (si vera l.)= as if they were, like; but text very dubious; Bi Bu [[תָּחֵת חֲמָתוֹ רְשָׁעִָים]] his wrath breaketh in pieces the wicked. (b) in partic., of things mutually interchanged, in place of, in exchange or return for: Ge 30:15 [[דּוּדָאֵי בְנֵח]] ´[[ת]]: in return, for thy son’s love-apples, Ex 21:23) [[גֶפְשׁ]]life for life, v:Ex 21:24, v:Ex 21:25, v:Ex 21:26, v:Ex 21:27, v:Ex 21:36, Ex 22:1, Jos 2:14 [[נַפְשֵׁנוּ תַחְתֵּיכֶם]] [[לָמוּת]], 1Sa 2:20, 1Ki 20:39 [[נפשׁו]] ´[[נפשׁך ת]]:, v:1Ki 20:42 (cf. 2Ki 10:24), 2Ki 21:2, Is 43:3, Is 43:4; often with vbs. of requiting, Ge 44:4 [[טוֹבָם]] ´[[לָ֫מּה שִׁלַּמְתֶּם רָעָה ת]]: why have ye rewarded evil in exchange for good ? 1Sa 25:21, 2Sa 16:12, 2Sa 19:22, Ps 35:12 [[טוֹבָה]] ´[[יְשַׁלְּמוּנִי דָעָה ת]]:, Ps 38:21 a, Ps 109:4, Ps 109:5, Pr 17:3 +; Je 5:19 [[תַּחַת מֶה]] in return for what? (cf. [[עַל־מֶה]] Je 22:8, De 29:23, 1Ki 9:8). So sq. inf. Ps 38:21. †
as

definitions.title: conj.: a.
definitions.body: [[תַּחַת אֲשֶׁר]]: (a) instead of that (German. anstatt dass), De 28:62 [[הֱיִיתֶם]] ´[[א]] :´[[ת]]: instead of that ye were..., instead of your being.., Ez Eze 36:34. (b) in return for (the fact) that, because that (LXX a)nq) w(=n Am 1:3 + oft.), Nu 25:13 ´[[אֲשֶׁר קִנׇּא לא]] :´[[ת]]:, De 21:14, De 22:29, De 28:47, 1Sa 26:21, 2Ki 22:17 = 2Ch 34:25, Is 53:12, Je 29:19, Je 50:7, 2Ch 21:12.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[תַּחַת כִּי]] De 4:37 (but ? read : [[וַתֶּֽחִי]] as end of v:De 4:36), Pr 1:29. Cf. ([[כִּי]])[[עֵקֶב אֲשֶׁר ]].
[[אֶל־תַּחַת]], after a vb. of motion:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: into the place of, Le 14:42.
[[מִתַּחַת]] (= u(p) e)k):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: alone, from under, from beneath as [[מִתַּחַת הַשָּׁמַיִם]] † Ge 1:7, and esp. after such vbs. as [[שִׁחֵת]] Ge 6:17, [[מָחֶה]] Ex 17:14, De 9:14, De 25:19, De 29:19, 2Ki 14:27, [[הֶאֲבִיד]] De 7:24, cf. La 3:66; Ez Eze 47:1 a [[מִפְּתַּן]] ´[[מִתּ]]: [[הַבַּיִת]], Pr 22:27 [[לָ֫מָּה יִקַח מִשְׁכָּֽבְּךָ מִּתַּחְתֶּיךָ]]; Ex 6:6, Ex 6:7 [[סִבְלוֹת מִחְרַיִם]] ´[[מִתּ]]:, Ho 4:12 [[אֱלֽהֵיהֶם]] ´[[וַיִּזְנוּ מִתּ]]: (cf.

definitions.title: II. 1 d
definitions.body: ) from under the hand (power) of ... Ex 18:10, 2Ki 8:20, 2Ki 8:22, 2Ki 13:5, 2Ki 17:7 +; [[מִתַּחְתָּיו]] (cf.

definitions.title: II. 2 a
definitions.body: ) from his place Ex 10:23, Zec 6:12. Rarely=[[תַּחַת]] or ´[[מִתַּחַת לְ]]:, Ge 1:9 (P) Ez Eze 1:8, Eze 42:9, Eze 46:23, Job 26:5.
